Articles.Content: 990. Epic moment approaching.

991: You feel a massive bump from the floor below. You descend out of curiosity to see pitch black. Somehow, an impossible thing happened that caused the floor's fate. You infer that someone said the floor was an epic moment approaching, which you immediately dismiss because of how foolish it seems.

992: You look out a window. You see the vast ground beneath you, bewildered by how small everything seems. You think about how large this building really is.

Floor 993: You wonder what city this building is in, but then remember that it's not in one - a building this tall has a base the size of Chicago's city limits and pretty much is a city on its own. Floor 993 is totally empty except for some old cardboard boxes and burned-out lightbulbs.
Floor 994 : A micro black hole is there, sucking all the oxygen in the room and inducing vaccum in it, prompting you to go to the next floor before dying.
995: 5 floors left before the epic!
996: 4 floors.
997: 3 floors. Almost there...
999: *initiates epic music*
1000: WE MADE IT!!!! OMG I never thought we would make it this far!
1001: 1001 Spikes lie here. And various people scold Sun for multiposting.
1001:the end
1003: You get hugged by flying holographic tesseracts.

1004: the MLP world. (Hurry, press the 'up' button!)

Edited October 16, 2014 by Engineer Of Stuff

1005: You see Sun in his natural habitat, floating in space with the planets going around him.

Boom! Didn't expect that, did ya?
Floor 1006: Whilst Dr.Vanhicktenstein is divulging the theory of everything to you, you accidentally press the up button
Floor 1007: And he continues the conversation at this floor...
1008: Republicans get angry in 1000 floors! (Obama 2008 reference)
1009: You smell WD-40. You get scared.

1010: 1100110101010100100000101010101

Meanwhile, the smell of WD-40 intensifies.
1012: Only 1000 more floors to go until the world ends. Huzzah.
1013: WD-40, WD-40 everywhere.

1014: I bet you can't read this binary.

Use binarytranslator.com to translate what that means.

1015: The message is revealed.
